description: The application lacks standard security headers like X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, Content-Security-Policy, Strict-Transport-Security, and others.
notes: This is expected for a basic static file server. SimpleHTTP does not support custom header injection. Not a critical issue for a development/test environment, but would be for production deployment. Increases vulnerability to clickjacking, MIME-type confusion, and XSS attacks if dynamic content is added."
